AboutPage.aboutme:
Hi, my name is Russell Trupiano and I am a senior in
					Computer Science Engineering at the University of
					Michigan â€“ Ann Arbor.

employers.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
employers.description:
Ported the Lucene open source search engine
								library from Java to C# for improved searching
								and indexing times of collected log files.
								Porting process included the conversion of
								2100 unit tests in order to ensure correctness
								of the port.

employers.title: Associate
employers.description:
Prepared the high quality salads, sandwiches,
								and specialty beverages for patrons, and also
								ensured cleanliness and a safe work environment
								for all by following proper cleaning and safety
								precautions. I also greeted and served patrons
								at the drive through with an optimistic attitude
								to ensure that patrons have the most pleasant
								possible experience.
awards:
I was honored with the Panera Bread Associate of the Year
					Award in August 2012 for providing quality products,
					following proper procedures, have a great attitude and
					always going above and beyond what was required of me.

employers.title: Concession Supervisor
employers.description:
I was responsible for ensuring that other
								employees followed proper protocol and
								completed tasks to the highest standard.
								I also assisted in resolving customer complaints
								and other various issues by approaching these
								situations with a positive attitude.

schools.name: University of Michigan - Ann Arbor
courses: Web Database and Information Systems (In Progress)
